summary: A perpetually evolving collection of warpaints.
descriptionHtml:
This will be a collection of all warpaints I create. Some will simply be hand-made, hi-res replacements for the originals. Some will be complete reimaginings. Some will have specific purposes. Some will be novelties. Most packs will be set up to overwrite the standard 10 warpaints, male and female. This way you can use them, whatever race you are. Or you can manually replace specific warpaints with others. Instructions below.

For every pack there will be a chart of screenshots, labelled with numbers. These numbers represent the last two digits of the file name. Sooo...

Female Chart:
01 = femaleheadwarpaint_01

Male Chart:
01 = maleheadwarpaint_01

===============================[ INSTALLATION ]===============================
NMM Compatible: Overwrites the 10 universal male and female paints.

If you want different choices during character creation:
 - 1. Extract the data folder into your skyrim directory.
 - 2. Overwrite any files.
 - 3. During character creation, browse and choose the warpaint of your liking.
 - 4. You can delete any warpaints you don\'t want. Use my charts to know which file is which.

If you already have a character with warpaint and want to change it:
 - 1. Find out the name of your warpaint file using the downloadable chart.
 - 2. Download the pack you want.
 - 3. Find out which paint you want using that pack\'s chart in the images section.
 - 4. Extract the paint you want to skyrim\\data\\textures\\actors\\character\\character assets\\tintmasks
 - 5. Rename the file as the name of your old warpaint from the chart.


================================[ UPCOMING ]================================

1. Skulls
2. Clowns - DONE!
3. Halloween - DONE! (Female screens coming soon!)
4. Facial Hair
5. Mages
6. Vampires
7. Tribal

Please give me more ideas!

Also, if anyone has any ideas for an easier installation method, it would be much appreciated. Right now, it seems like showracemenu does not allow the changing of warpaints unless you reset your character. I am using so many mods right now, I can\'t test if this is the same for everyone.


================================[ FINISHED ]================================

Clown Paints:
_01 - Happy Clown 1
_02 - Happy Clown 2
_03 - Sad Clown
_04 - The Joker
_05 - The Crow
_06 - Happy Clown 3
_07 - Mime
_08 - Shaggy 2 Dope (ICP)
_09 - Violent Jay (ICP)
_10 - Jester

Halloween Paints
_01 - Jack/Sally (male/female)
_02 - Saw Puppet
_03 - Jack-o-Lantern 1
_04 - Jack-o-Lantern 2
_05 - Jason Voorhees
_06 - Veins
_07 - Pinhead
_08 - Chucky
_09 - Hannibal Lector
_10 - V for Vendetta



Note: Due to other engagements (and other games) I do not plan on updating this or any of my other mods, indefinitely. At a later date, my interest in Skyrim may come back but until then, please do not leave impatient comments about updates or fixes.
author: Valstein0
